reference.title: Failing over Nodes
reference.shortdesc: Nodes are failed over via hard failover via the POST /controller/failOver HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: Failing over a node indicates that the node is no longer available in a cluster and replicated data on another node should be made available to clients. This endpoint along with the otpNode parameter (internal node name) fails over a specific node.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: curl -v -X POST -u admin:password http://localhost:port/controller/failOver -d allowUnsafe=[ true | false ] -d otpNode=[node@hostname]
